name: Daniel Needs Help
description:
Daniel Needs Help is a short PSX-style horror game made using Unity by two devs. You need to find and help your brother, Daniel. But some wild things happen along the way. You can also explore the diferent endings of the game.

[THIS GAME HAS 3 DIFERENT ENDINGS]

Controls:
Look: Mouse
Move: WASD
Interact1: E
Interact2: Left Mouse Button
Drop: G
